Text.Text: Iron, copper and zinc mines produce sulfur as extra output, when this module is placed next to them. Requires coal as input.
Iron, and bauxit mines produce sulfur as extra output, when this module is placed next to them. Requires coal as input.
Sulfur dioxide can be obtained from sulfidic iron, copper and zinc ores by roasting them for several hours.
Sulfur dioxide can be obtained from sulfidic iron and bauxit ores by roasting them for several hours.
If more than 5 sulfur pits are built, the island's reserves are depleted to such an extent that all pits cease to function.
